Reviews.Title: “The wrong place to rest in”
Reviews.Author: DonADAM
Reviews.Content: It's a terrible place to check in even for a Business trip we had too much trouble with the stuff especially the girl in the office they are very oregan and unhelpfull ...I guess this the opinion of most of the reviews.

Reviews.Title: “Noisy Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Maziar20
Reviews.Content: Hi there, If you want to sleep at night, and you need peace and quite, NEVER EVER go to this hotel. The Night Club is too noisy and cannot sleep you till 3 a.m. in the morning.

Reviews.Title: “Over all nice budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: Asif9211
Reviews.Content: My friend recommended me this hotel he is a regular there, the staff is very helpful. Food was very good. Rooms are good size and clean. Overall very good hotel.

Reviews.Title: “dont think about it”
Reviews.Author: solid61
Reviews.Content: yes its is 3 star hotel,but you do not have good feel on it.because of employers. they're not kind.and some waiters in restaurant are rude,in their small restaurant they give you the food like give food to a poor people .the restaurant is dirty,also dishes and forks .you can not sleep well because of hotel nightclubs . they don't help you to caring your bags . the rooms partly clean .but they didn't clean the room every day.

Reviews.Title: “It's not good !”
Reviews.Author: aila26
Reviews.Content: We stayed there for 3 nights, it's located in a noisy street, it was bad, break fast and lunch buffet those were free when you book this hotel, but not well at all, and whole the hotel smells. But staffs were nice and kindly.

Reviews.Title: “Noisy Nightclub in Basement of Hotel”
Reviews.Author: citylivin187
Reviews.Content: This hotel is fine as long as you don't expect to sleep during your stay. Can't understand why none of the other reviews (nor the hotel website!) mentioned the fact that a nightclub is located in the basement of this hotel. Loud base music is played until 3am and the whole hotel shakes and vibrates to it. We were on the 2nd floor and it felt like our pillows were vibrating. We eventually rang down to reception at 2am to find out what was going on, the concierge sounded like he'd heard it all before and offered to move us to another room the next day - but we were only staying one night! We got about 4 hours sleep. AVOID AVOID AVOID. There are many other hotels in the same area, and the same price range, that do not have nightclubs in the basement!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel to stay”
Reviews.Author: ralirehmani
Reviews.Content: I was there in Last year July, with my wife, I found this hotel neat, clean, good customer service, excellent food, excellent varieties at complimentary Breakfast, I would stay again during my next visit. Ramzan Ali Rehmani

Reviews.Title: “not satisfied at all”
Reviews.Author: sadTabriz
Reviews.Content: I didn't like hotel at all. The service was very poor. We checked in on Wednsday but our room was not cleaned by Saturday. There are few people to do the cleaning. They didn't have any crib for baby There was only one restaurant and it was very small and not very clean. They had open buffet for lunch but every day almost the same food. But at night every thing in the restaurant seemed very nice because you should have paid if U wanted to eat there. In this condition you felt like a poor person whom they give food for free at lunch!!!! although they had counted the price of breakfast and lunch on your pakage. At breakfast time, in the same restaurant, you couldn't have more than one cup of tea. In addition the behavior of the waiters and waiteresses was not very satisfactory. It is a 3 star hotel but it doesn't have parking although it is located in a busy street and needs parking. I won't go there any more at all.

HotelInfo.Name: Montreal Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Al Nakhal St | P.O. Box No: 34296, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
